\doxysection{Traffic Class Reference}
\hypertarget{class_traffic}{}\label{class_traffic}\index{Traffic@{Traffic}}


The \doxylink{class_traffic}{Traffic} class manages a simulation of multiple vehicles with their positions and velocities, along with collision detection and perception.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$traffic.\+h$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
The \doxylink{class_traffic}{Traffic} class manages a simulation of multiple vehicles with their positions and velocities, along with collision detection and perception.

\index{step@{step}!Traffic@{Traffic}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{step()}{step()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \label{class_traffic_a5492795254a235bd18baf84c253d5854} 
void Traffic\+::step (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const std\+::vector$<$ int $>$ \&}]{high\+\_\+level\+\_\+actions}{, }\item[{const std\+::vector$<$ std\+::vector$<$ float $>$ $>$ \&}]{low\+\_\+level\+\_\+actions}{}\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Advances the simulation by one time step, updating agent positions and handling actions. 

Performs a simulation step. Updates agent positions based on high-\/level and low-\/level actions, updates perceptions, and checks for collisions.


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em high\+\_\+level\+\_\+actions} & High-\/level actions for each agent. \\
\hline
{\em low\+\_\+level\+\_\+actions} & Low-\/level actions for each agent. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
